titles.title: Royalty In-Kind for Energy Assistance Improvement Act of 2006

To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to authorize discounted sales of royalty oil and gas taken in-kind from a Federal oil or gas lease to provide additional resources to Federal low-income energy assistance programs.
Royalty In-Kind for Energy Assistance Improvement Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary:
Royalty In-Kind for Energy Assistance Improvement Act of 2006 - Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005, with respect to federal low-income energy assistance programs, to authorize the Secretary of Energy to sell at a discounted price any royalty oil or gas taken in-kind.
Requires the discounted price to be at least 50% of the fair market value of the oil or gas.
